General.Name: Fabryki Mebli Forte S.A.
General.Description: Fabryki Mebli FORTE S.A. designs, manufactures, and exports furniture worldwide. The company offers furniture for dining room, living room, youth room, office, hallway, and bedroom. It markets its products through retail chains and furniture stores in Europe. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Ostrów Mazowiecka, Poland.
